About us

MEGAtor is a free and anonymous file-sharing dark platform. Share all types content (files, images, music, videos etc...). There is no limit, you download at the maximum speed of your connection and everything is free. Issues or suggestions, hit us up on GuanXi or drop us a line at megator-help@protonmail.com

You will need to accept our Terms of service to proceed to our website.
